# Streamer.bot-Countdown-Timer


Add System.dll as a reference in the Countdown Timer C# Execute Code sub-action.
In OBS, add a scene called "[NS] Countdown Timer" and a source called "[TS] Countdown Timer".
Create a timer command and have it call the "TimerStart" action.
The TimerDone action is called when the timer hits 0.

Usage:
For a 5 minute timer, type !timer 5
